plugin.name: b0RemoteApi
plugin.author: marc@coppeliarobotics.com
plugin.description: API functions for the BlueZero-based remote API.

command.name: simxServiceCall
command.description: Returns the topic for service calls

command.name: simxDefaultPublisher
command.description: Returns the topic for the default publisher

command.name: simxDefaultSubscriber
command.description: Returns the topic for the default subscriber

param.name: callBackFunc
param.description: The callback function for the subscriber

param.name: publishInterval
param.description: The rate (in terms of simulation loops) at which the server (i.e. V-REP) should publish the message

command.name: simxCreatePublisher
command.description: Creates a custom publisher topic, and returns it

param.name: dropMessages
param.description: Whether some messages will be dropped if a queue is forming. In that case, the freshest messages will be retained

param.name: topic
param.description: The topic of the created publisher

command.name: simxCreateSubscriber
command.description: Creates a custom subscriber topic, and returns it

param.name: callBackFunc
param.description: The callback function for the subscriber

param.name: publishInterval
param.description: The rate (in terms of simulation loops) at which the server (i.e. V-REP) should publish the message

param.name: dropMessages
param.description: Whether some messages will be dropped if a queue is forming. In that case, the freshest message will be retained

command.name: simxGetTimeInMs
command.description: Returns the system time in milliseconds

command.name: simxSpin
command.description: Handles all callbacks for subscribers that have messages waiting, in a loop (i.e. does not return)

command.name: simxSpinOnce
command.description: Calls all callbacks for subscribers that have messages waiting, then returns

command.name: simxSynchronous
command.description: Enables/disables the V-REP synchronous mode during simulation. In synchonous mode, each simulation step will require an external trigger signal in order to be run

param.name: enable
param.description: The enable state of the synchonous mode

command.name: simxSynchronousTrigger
command.description: Triggers next simulation step, if the V-REP synchronous mode was previously enabled

command.name: simxGetSimulationStepDone
command.description: Checks whether the current simulation step finished executing

param.name: topic
param.description: The [L[#topics,topic or communication channel]] to use for executing the function call. Recommended is [L[#simxDefaultSubscriber]]

command.name: simxGetSimulationStepStarted
command.description: Checks whether the current simulation step finished executing

param.name: topic
param.description: The [L[#topics,topic or communication channel]] to use for executing the function call. Recommended is [L[#simxDefaultSubscriber]]
